data.title: Boise School District
data.text:
Boise Schools Again Recognized as Leaders in Energy Management08/28/2024

empty

The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) recognized fifteen Boise School District facilities as “50001 Ready.”

Read More...

Boise School District Superintendent Lisa Roberts Speaks about 2024-2025 School Year 08/14/2024

empty

During an interview with KTVB-TV on the first day of school (August 14, 2024), Boise School District Superintendent Lisa Roberts passionately outlined her vision and plans for the 2024-2025 school year, highlighting the district's commitment to innovation and excellence.

Read More...

Board Approves Transition of Owyhee Elementary School to an Early Learning Center Beginning 2025-2026 School Year08/13/2024

empty

During the Boise School Board's regular monthly meeting on August 12, 2024, trustees officially approved the transition of Owyhee Elementary School into a new early learning center, serving Pre-K children (ages 3-5), beginning in the 2025-2026 school year. This change reflects the District’s ongoing commitment to expanding early childhood education opportunities and ensuring a strong educational foundation for the youngest members of our community.

Read More...

Boise School District News: Back-To-School Guide08/01/2024

empty

Get ready for the new school year! Check out the latest Boise School District newsletter for all the important back-to-school information. From key dates and supply lists to new programs, we've got everything you need to start the year off right. Don't miss out—stay informed and prepared!

Read More...

Boise School District to Integrate EV School Buses Into Fleet Beginning 202607/25/2024

empty

Boise School District, a nationally recognized leader in sustainability, has been awarded $2,760,000 in grant funds from the latest round of the Environmental Protection Agency’s Clean School Bus Program (CSBP). Together with Durham School Services and electric vehicle (EV) partner Highland Electric Fleets, Boise School District will integrate up to eight electric school buses into its fleet, as part of a pilot program.

Read More...

Ballot Finalized for 2024 Boise School Board Trustee Election07/24/2024

empty

The official ballot for the Boise School Board Trustee Election on Tuesday, September 3, 2024 has been finalized. There will be only one race on this year’s ballot.

Read More...

2024-2025 School Year Information 07/01/2024

empty

To help our families prepare for the 2024-2025 school year, we've created this back to school webpage to ensure you have the most accurate and detailed information to start the new school year smoothly.
